title: Nuage Utility Host External Interfaces List
description: Configuration for external interfaces for NUH

name.title: NUH external network name
name.description: Name of the external network for NUH

ext.title: External Network interface number
ext.description: Number for the external network interface

external_ip.title: External Network IP address
external_ip.description: IP address of the external network interface. This network is the one where NSGs reside

external_ip_prefix.title: External Network IP Prefix Length
external_ip_prefix.description: IP Prefix length for the external network

external_gateway.title: External Network Gateway IP
external_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the external network

vlan.title: External Network VLAN ID
vlan.description: Optional VLAN ID for external network. Must be unique per external interface. If unspecified, VLAN is unassigned and only one external interface can be used

external_fqdn.title: External FQDN Name
external_fqdn.description: Optional External FQDN name. A valid cert of this FQDN will be generated from the VSD and transferred to NUH

external_bridge.title: External Network Bridge
external_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the external network on the NUH. This will be a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. Defaults to using access bridge

dvswitch_name.title: Distributed vSwitch Name
dvswitch_name.description: Name of the distrubuted vSwitch. Required to identify correct distributed portgroup, if there are multiple of the same name.
